Html:
I have followed the tutorial step by step, but these two are null - not reading from sampledata.cs for some reason. They are:

When I run project, the home page at index() action is still smooth, but when i click on Store link, 

It's display a message In StoreController at the line of code: 

var genres = storeDB.Genres.ToList(); and message: Unable to find the requested .Net Framework Data Provider.  It may not be installed.

and the same error in the line of code var genreModel = storeDB.Genres.Include("Albums").Single(g => g.Name == genre); in another case.

can anyone offer a direction?

thank you!

HungTran
